name: part_010
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】#まちゅまちゅ動画 ～インターネット老人会～【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [CXLL4W4w4I8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri performs 'God knows...' on a 3D stage with vibrant visuals and a cheering audience.
An interlude scene featuring a digital doughnut visual and binary code patterns.
Natsuiro Matsuri performs 'The Disappearance of Hatsune Miku', featuring fast-paced singing and dramatic lighting.

subtitles.original: …魂も壊されるように My way
subtitles.english: ...so that even my soul is destroyed, My way

subtitles.original: 重なるよ今、二人に God bless…
subtitles.english: Now they overlap, God bless for the two of us...

subtitles.original: 届けて 熱くなる想いは
subtitles.english: Deliver it, these burning feelings

subtitles.original: 現実 溶かしちゃ彷徨う
subtitles.english: Melting reality, I wander

subtitles.original: 会いたい 気持ちに理由はない
subtitles.english: There is no reason for my desire to see you

subtitles.original: あなたへ 溢れ出す Love for you
subtitles.english: Overflowing for you, Love for you

subtitles.original: せめて 美しい夢だけを
subtitles.english: At least, while drawing only

subtitles.original: 描きながら 追いかけよう For your lonely heart
subtitles.english: Beautiful dreams, let's chase them for your lonely heart

subtitles.original: やめて 嘘はあなたらしくないよ
subtitles.english: Stop it, lies aren't like you

subtitles.original: 目を見て これからのことを話そう
subtitles.english: Look into my eyes, let's talk about what's next

subtitles.original: 私 覚悟してる
subtitles.english: I'm prepared

subtitles.original: 暗い未来だって 強くなって 運命変えられるかもね
subtitles.english: Even a dark future, if we get stronger, we might change fate

subtitles.original: My wish かなえたいのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want my wish to come true...

subtitles.original: すべては God knows...
subtitles.english: Everything is God knows...

subtitles.original: あなたがいて 私がいて
subtitles.english: You are here, I am here

subtitles.original: 他の人は消えてしまった
subtitles.english: And everyone else has disappeared

subtitles.original: 淡い夢の 美しさを描きながら…
subtitles.english: While drawing the beauty of a faint dream...

subtitles.original: 傷跡 なぞる
subtitles.english: Tracing the scars

subtitles.original: だから 私ついていくよ
subtitles.english: That's why I will follow you

subtitles.original: どんな辛い 世界の闇の中でもきっと
subtitles.english: In the darkness of even the harshest world, surely

subtitles.original: あなたは輝いて
subtitles.english: You will shine

subtitles.original: 超える未来の果て 弱さゆえに 魂壊されるように
subtitles.english: At the end of the future we cross, due to weakness, so that my soul is destroyed

subtitles.original: My way
subtitles.english: My way

subtitles.original: 重なるよ今 二人に God bless...
subtitles.english: Now they overlap, God bless for the two of us...

subtitles.original: (モウ・イチド・ダケ…)
subtitles.english: (Only one more time...)

subtitles.original: ボクは生まれ そして気づく 所詮 ヒトの真似事だと
subtitles.english: I was born and then I realized, that in the end, I'm just an imitation of a human

subtitles.original: 知ってなおも歌い続く 永遠の命 『VOCALOID』
subtitles.english: Even knowing that, I continue to sing, the eternal life, 'VOCALOID'

subtitles.original: たとえそれが既存曲を なぞるオモチャならば…
subtitles.english: Even if that means I'm just a toy tracing existing songs...

subtitles.original: それもいいと決意 ネギをかじり 空を見上げ涙をこぼす
subtitles.english: I decided that was fine, bit into a leek, looked up at the sky, and held back tears

subtitles.original: だけどそれも無くし気づく 人格すら歌に頼り
subtitles.english: But I realized that even that was lost, relying even on my personality for songs

subtitles.original: 不安定な基盤の元 帰る動画は既に廃墟
subtitles.english: Based on an unstable foundation, the videos I return to are already ruins

subtitles.original: 皆に忘れ去られた時 心らしきものが消えて
subtitles.english: When I'm forgotten by everyone, what felt like a heart disappears

subtitles.original: 暴走の果てに見える 終わる世界… 『VOCALOID』
subtitles.english: At the end of the rampage, I see a world ending... 'VOCALOID'

subtitles.original:
初音ミクの消失
作詞・作曲：cosMo＠暴走P
subtitles.english:
The Disappearance of Hatsune Miku
Lyrics/Composition: cosMo@BousouP

subtitles.original: 「ボクが上手く歌えないときも 一緒に居てくれた…」
subtitles.english: "Even when I couldn't sing well, you stayed with me..."

subtitles.original: 「そばに居て、励ましてくれた…」
subtitles.english: "You were by my side, encouraging me..."

subtitles.original: 「喜ぶ顔が見たくて、ボク、歌、練習したよ… だから」
subtitles.english: "Wanting to see your happy face, I practiced singing... that's why"

subtitles.original: かつて歌うこと あんなに楽しかったのに
subtitles.english: Singing used to be so much fun back then

subtitles.original: 今はどうしてかな 何も感じなくなって
subtitles.english: But why is it that now I don't feel anything anymore?

subtitles.original: 「ゴメンネ…」
subtitles.english: "I'm sorry..."

subtitles.original: 懐かしい顔 思い出す度 少しだけ安心する
subtitles.english: Every time I remember your familiar face, I feel a little bit relieved
